comments.body:
It seems that you have some entry points, so you may add them
Please see
https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#python-entry-points

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"
  entry_points:
    - vcftutorials = orangecontrib.single_cell.tutorials:main
